verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>letter<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1540>exile,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had <S%H1540>taken<s%> into <S%H1473>exile<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

(This was <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> and the <S%H1377>queen<s%> <S%H1377>mother,<s%> the <S%H5631>court<s%> <S%H5631>officials,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and the <S%H4525>smiths<s%> had <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>)

[The letter was <S%H7971>sent<s%>] by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H501>Elasah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H1587>Gemariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> sent to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1473>exiles<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H1540>sent<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%>
<S%H1129>'Build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> [in them;] and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>produce.<s%>

<S%H3947>'Take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> and <S%H3205>become<s%> the <S%H3205>fathers<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H376>husbands,<s%> that they may <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> and do not <S%H4591>decrease.<s%>

'And <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H1540>sent<s%> you into <S%H1540>exile,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on its <S%H1157>behalf;<s%> for in its <S%H7965>welfare<s%> you will <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7965>welfare.<s%> '

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'Do not let your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in your <S%H7130>midst<s%> and your <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H5378>deceive<s%> you, and do not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H2472>dreams<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H2492>dream.<s%>
'For they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> to you in My <S%H8034>name;<s%> I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> them,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>'When<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have <S%H4390>been<s%> <S%H4390>completed<s%> for <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> you and <S%H6965>fulfill<s%> My <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to you, to <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

'For I <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4284>plans<s%> that I <S%H2803>have<s%> for you,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4284>'plans<s%> for <S%H7965>welfare<s%> and not for <S%H9567>calamity<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H319>future<s%> and a <S%H8615>hope.<s%>
'Then you will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Me and <S%H1980>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to Me, and I will <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you.
'And you will <S%H1245>seek<s%> Me and <S%H4672>find<s%> [Me,] <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H1875>search<s%> for Me with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

'And I will be <S%H4672>found<s%> by you,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> your <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> you,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H1540>sent<s%> you into <S%H1540>exile.<s%>'
<S%H3588>"Because<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6965>raised<s%> up <S%H5030>prophets<s%> for us in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>' –

for <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> who <S%H3427>sits<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> did not <S%H3318>go<s%> with you into <S%H1473>exile<s%> –

<S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am <S%H7971>sending<s%> upon them the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them like split-open <S%H8384>figs<s%> that <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>due<s%> to <S%H7455>rottenness.<s%>

'And I will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with <S%H7458>famine<s%> and with <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them a <S%H2113>terror<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to be a <S%H423>curse,<s%> and a <S%H8047>horror,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them,

<S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to My <S%H1697>words,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>'which<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to them <S%H7925>again<s%> and <S%H7971>again<s%> by My <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> but you did not <S%H8085>listen,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"You, therefore, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H1473>exiles,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah<s%> and <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> who are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> to you <S%H8267>falsely<s%> in My <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

'And <S%H4480>because<s%> of them a <S%H7045>curse<s%> shall be <S%H3947>used<s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1546>exiles<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> you like <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> and like <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7033>roasted<s%> in the <S%H784>fire,<s%>

<S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H6213>acted<s%> <S%H5039>foolishly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and have <S%H5003>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with their neighbors' <S%H802>wives,<s%> and have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in My <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I did not <S%H6680>command<s%> them; and I am He who <S%H3045>knows,<s%> and am a <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> '"
And to <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%> you shall <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in your own <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to be the <S%H6496>overseer<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> over <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7696>madman<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesies,<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> him in the <S%H4115>stocks<s%> and in the <S%H6729>iron<s%> <S%H6729>collar,<s%>
<S%H6258>now<s%> then, <S%H4100>why<s%> have you not <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H6069>Anathoth<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesies<s%> to you?

"For he has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to us in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> '[The exile] will be <S%H752>long;<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> [in them] and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>produce.<s%>'"'"
And <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>letter<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7971>"Send<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1473>exiles,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite,<s%>" <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> to you, although I did not <S%H7971>send<s%> him, and he has made you <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H8267>lie,<s%> "

<S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%> and his <S%H2233>descendants;<s%> he shall not <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H9185>good<s%> that I am about to <S%H6213>do<s%> to My <S%H5971>people,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>"because<s%> he has <S%H1696>preached<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"' "
